DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare pharmacokinetic characteristic DP-R206 ( 150mg Ibandronate / 24,000 IU Vitamin D3 complex tablet , qd ) Vitamin D3 ( 24,000 IU Vitamin D3 , qd ) oral administration healthy adult volunteer .

Patients randomly assign either Vitamin D3 tablet ( 24,000 IU Vitamin D3 , qd ) first , DP-R206 ( 150mg Ibandronate / 24,000 IU Vitamin D3 complex tablet , qd ) Second DP-R206 ( 150mg Ibandronate / 24,000 IU Vitamin D3 complex tablet , qd ) first , Vitamin D3 tablet ( 24,000 IU Vitamin D3 , qd ) second .
